Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true
BaseSpring = BasePart:Clone() BaseSpring.Name = "Spring" BaseSpring.Size = Vector3.new(1, 3.25, 1.5) SpringMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") SpringMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh SpringMesh.MeshId = "" SpringMesh.TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "223832174") SpringMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2, 1.05, 1) SpringMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) SpringMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) SpringMesh.Parent = BaseSpring
Animations = { IdleMovement = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("IdleMovement"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, }
Gravity = 196.20 JumpHeightPercentage = 0.25
ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
function GetAllConnectedParts(Object) local Parts = {} local function GetConnectedParts(Object) for i, v in pairs(Object:GetConnectedParts()) do local Ignore = false for ii, vv in pairs(Parts) do if v == vv then Ignore = true end end if not Ignore then table.insert(Parts, v) GetConnectedParts(v) end end end GetConnectedParts(Object) return Parts end
function SetGravityEffect() if not ToolEquipped then return end if not GravityEffect or not GravityEffect.Parent then GravityEffect = Instance.new("BodyForce") GravityEffect.Name = "GravityCoilEffect" GravityEffect.Parent = Torso end local TotalMass = 0 local ConnectedParts = GetAllConnectedParts(Torso) for i, v in pairs(ConnectedParts) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then TotalMass = (TotalMass + v:GetMass()) end end local TotalMass = (TotalMass * 196.20 * (1 - JumpHeightPercentage)) GravityEffect.force = Vector3.new(0, TotalMass, 0) end
function HandleGravityEffect(Enabled) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end for i, v in pairs(Torso:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BodyForce") then v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped, DescendantAdded, DescendantRemoving}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end if Enabled and ToolEquipped then local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) SetGravityEffect() DescendantAdded = Character.DescendantAdded:connect(function() wait() if not CurrentlyEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end SetGravityEffect() end) DescendantRemoving = Character.DescendantRemoving:connect(function() wait() if not CurrentlyEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end SetGravityEffect() end) end end
function ManageSprings(CreateSprings)
if not CreateSprings then return end
local LeftLeg = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") local RightLeg = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Leg")
if LeftLeg then LeftSpring = BaseSpring:Clone() LeftSpring.Name = "LeftSpring" LeftSpring.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "223832136") local LeftSpringWeld = Instance.new("Weld") LeftSpringWeld.Part0 = LeftLeg LeftSpringWeld.Part1 = LeftSpring LeftSpringWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() LeftSpringWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 1.25, -0.05, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) LeftSpringWeld.Parent = LeftSpring LeftSpring.Parent = Tool end if RightLeg then RightSpring = BaseSpring:Clone() RightSpring.Name = "RightSpring" RightSpring.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "223832084") local RightSpringWeld = Instance.new("Weld") RightSpringWeld.Part0 = RightLeg RightSpringWeld.Part1 = RightSpring RightSpringWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() RightSpringWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 1.25, -0.05, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) RightSpringWeld.Parent = RightSpring RightSpring.Parent = Tool end
for i, v in pairs({LeftSpring, RightSpring}) do if v and v.Parent then Spawn(function() InvokeClient("SetLocalTransparencyModifier", {Object = v, Transparency = 0, AutoUpdate = false}) end) end end
Torso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, ((Torso.Size.Y / 2) + (BaseSpring.Size.Y / 2)), 0)
end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true Spawn(function() InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.IdleMovement) end) Spawn(function() HumanoidDied = Humanoid.Died:connect(function() if GravityEffect and GravityEffect.Parent then GravityEffect:Destroy() end end) ManageSprings(true) HandleGravityEffect(true) end) Handle.Transparency = 1 end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs({LeftSpring, RightSpring, GravityEffect}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped, DescendantAdded, DescendantRemoving, HumanoidDied}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Handle.Transparency = 0 ToolEquipped = false end
function OnServerInvoke(player, mode, value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not value or not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
Animations = {} LocalObjects = {}
Sounds = { SpringSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SpringSound"), }
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Rate = (1 / 60)
ToolEquipped = false
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) local IgnoreList = ((type(IgnoreList) == "table" and IgnoreList) or {IgnoreList}) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function CanJump() local Direction = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) local DistanceBelow = ((Torso.Size.Y * 1.5) + Handle.Size.Y + 0.1) local Ignore = {Character} local RayPositions = { (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, 0)).p, --Center (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(-((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, 0)).p, --Center Left (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, 0)).p, --Center Right (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, ((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Front Center (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, -((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Back Center (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(-((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, -((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Back Left (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, -((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Back Right (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(-((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, ((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Front Left (Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(((Torso.Size.X / 2) + 0.2), 0, ((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0.2))).p, --Front Right } for i, v in pairs(RayPositions) do local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = RayCast(v, Direction, DistanceBelow, Ignore) if RayHit then return true end end return false end
function SetAnimation(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) Spawn(function() Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(Torso.Velocity.X, 0, Torso.Velocity.Z) Humanoid.AutoRotate = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped, HumanoidJumped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) HumanoidJumped = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then if Humanoid.Jump and CanJump() then Sounds.SpringSound.Pitch = (math.random(1100, 1300) * 0.001) Sounds.SpringSound:Play() Humanoid.AutoRotate = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 50, 0) wait(0.5) local JumpEnabled = false while CheckIfAlive() and Humanoid.Jump and not JumpEnabled and CurrentlyEquipped do JumpEnabled = CanJump() wait(Rate) end if CurrentlyEquipped then Humanoid.AutoRotate = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Humanoid.Jump = false Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(Torso.Velocity.X, 0, Torso.Velocity.Z) Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall) end else Humanoid.Jump = false end end end) Humanoid.Jump = false Spawn(function() Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.None) end) end) end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false LocalObjects = {} for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end for i, v in pairs({ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier, ToolUnequipped, HumanoidJumped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Animations = {} if CheckIfAlive() then Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall) Humanoid.AutoRotate = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", Value) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "SetLocalTransparencyModifier" and Value and ToolEquipped then pcall(function() local ObjectFound = false for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v == Value then ObjectFound = true end end if not ObjectFound then table.insert(LocalObjects, Value) if ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier then ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier:disconnect() end ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier = RunService.RenderStepped:connect(function() for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then if ((not v.AutoUpdate and (v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier == 1 or v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier == 0)) or v.AutoUpdate) then v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier = v.Transparency end else table.remove(LocalObjects, i) end end end) end end) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
